com.illumina.basespace

Interface BaseSpaceSession


  • public interface BaseSpaceSession
    Defines the operations that can be performed against the BaseSpace API
    Author:
    bking, kyokum

      • download

        void download(File file,
            File targetFolder)
        Download a file to local folder. The destination file will have the same name as the source file.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to download
        targetFolder - the target local folder

      • download

        void download(File file,
            long fileStart,
            long len,
            File target,
            long targetStart)
        Expose a single chunk of download to the client. Thread-safe API call. Multiple threads may use this call to do parallel fetches of a single file. This is a range download from file, starting at fileStart for len bytes. It will write data into target starting at targetStart. If file is a directory, this will use target/-start-len.dat
        Parameters:
        file - the file to download
        fileStart - the starting position for the file
        len - the length to retrieve
        target - the target local file
        targetStart - target local file starting position

      • queryVariantRaw

                     String chromosome,
                     VariantFetchParams params)
        Perform a variant query against the raw API
        Parameters:
        file - the variant file to query
        chromosome - the chromosome to query
        params - the variant fetch parameters
        Returns:
        a string containing one or more records from the vcf
